articles.title: ECB raises rates by unprecedented 75 basis points - Economic Times
articles.description: The ECB lifted its deposit rate to 0.75% from zero and raised the main refinancing rate to 1.25%, their highest level since 2011, as inflation is becoming increasingly broad and was at risk of getting entrenched.
